proposal: Navigating the digital realm can feel like proving you're not a robot 🤖, but with evm.storage's focus on secure, decentralized storage, it's clear you're all about empowering real human connections. Congrats on reaching 202 holders on the ETH network! If you're looking to expand your community's toolkit, our DEX and Lottery platforms could seamlessly align with your vision, offering both fun and functionality.
